Docs.summary: Interface that provides a serialization API to store state during a save operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (string key, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Serialize(string key, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The types can be strings, Vector2, Vector3, Vector4, IntRect, Quaternion, Colors, floats, ints, unsigned ints, bools and doubles.
Docs.summary: Serializes the value with the specified key.
